data.description: Add 'sprint suggest' command that analyzes pending tasks and suggests next sprint focus based on priority, dependencies, and coverage gaps.

properties.description: Add 'sprint suggest' command that analyzes pending tasks and suggests next sprint focus based on priority, dependencies, and coverage gaps.
properties.retrospective: Added 'sprint suggest' CLI command. Analyzes pending tasks by priority (critical/high/medium/low scoring) with blocker penalty. Supports --limit and --strategy options. Displays formatted task recommendations.
properties.title: Add sprint suggest command
